diagnosis_num_nulls.description: Number of null entries encountered when calculating diagnosis.

communication.description: Communication. Subscore used in assigning diagnosis.

social_interaction.description: Social interaction. Subscore used in assigning diagnosis.

restricted_repetitive_behavior.description: Restricted repetitive behavior. Subscore used in assigning diagnosis.

QA01.description: Does your child display non-echoed spoken language

QA02.description: Does your child display Speech abnormalities associated with autism (intonation/volume/rhythm/rate

QA03.description: Does your child display Immediate echolalia

QA04.description: Does your child display Stereotyped/idiosyncratic use of words or phrases

QA06.description: Does your child display Asks for information

QA07.description: Does your child display Reporting of events

QA09.description: Does your child display Descriptive, conventional, instrumental, or informational gestures

QB01.description: Does your child display Unusual eye contact

QB02.description: Does your child display Facial expressions directed to examiner

QB03.description: Does your child display Language production and linked nonverbal communication

QB04.description: Does your child display Shared enjoyment in interaction

QB05.description: Does your child display Comments on others' emotions/empathy

QB06.description: Does your child display Insight into typical social situations and relationships

QB07.description: Does your child display Quality of social overtures

QB08.description: Does your child display Amount of social overtures/maitenance of attention

QB09.description: Does your child display Quality of social response

QB10.description: Does your child display Amount of reciprocal social communication

QB11.description: Does your child display Overall quality of rapport

QD01.description: Does your child display Unusual sensory interest in play material/person

QD02.description: Does your child display Hand and finger and other complex mannerisms

QD03.description: Does your child display Self-injurious behavior

QD04.description: Does your child display Excessive interest in or references to unusual or highly specific topics or objects or repetitive behaviors

QD05.description: Does your child display Compulsions or rituals

QE02.description: Does your child display Tantrums, aggression, negative or disruptive behavior
